Advisory: Kiwitcms 6.10 updates Django from 2.2.1 to 2.2.2 (see CVE-2019-11358). Additionally, it adds missing permission checks for menus in Test run page UI template. Permission check are also added for TestExecution status and comment menu. See <https://github.com/kiwitcms/Kiwi/issues/716>. Lastly, it re-enables static analysis with `bandit` and `Coverity Scan` in Travis CI.
